review_details: Sincerity, attitude and taste of Rhodes - these are the main words that make our family meet Vassilis for several years.

reviewTitle: The pearl of the old Rhodes cooking art
review_details: We are traveling to Rhodes for five seasons and this is really the best cuisine we have found. It is assumed that in Greece, restaurants are run by families, but here we felt very strong spirit of the restaurant team - you are assisted all the time by anyone who is close to you.
